text: The Wey VV6 is a compact luxury Crossover SUV made by Wey which is a premium brand of Great Wall Motors (GWM) from 2018 to 2021. == History and Features == The Wey VV6 was launched in 2018. It shares its plataform with The Wey VV5 and The Haval H6. The SUV has a 2.0 liter turbo gasoline engine and a 7-speed DCT transmission. == Markets == The Wey VV6 was sold mainly in The Chinese Market during its entire production. == Discontinuation == The production of The Wey VV6 ended in 2021 and the car was later discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Wey VV6
